alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 6:18AM MST until December 14 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains, Little Belt and Highwood Mountains, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass and Cascade County below 5000ft. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds behind the cold front may result in a few hours of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
